name: Barbell Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell with an underhand grip, curl the barbell up to shoulder level, and lower it back down.

name: Dumbbell Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a dumbbell in each hand with an underhand grip, curl the dumbbells up to shoulder level, and lower them back down.

name: Hammer Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip (palms facing each other), curl the dumbbells up to shoulder level, and lower them back down.

name: Preacher Curl
how_to: Sit on a preacher bench with your upper arms resting on the pad, hold a barbell or dumbbells with an underhand grip, curl the weight up to shoulder level, and lower it back down.

name: Concentration Curl
how_to: Sit on a bench, hold a dumbbell in one hand, rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, curl the dumbbell up to shoulder level, and lower it back down.

name: Cable Curl
how_to: Stand facing a cable machine, hold a bar attachment with an underhand grip, curl the bar up to shoulder level, and lower it back down.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
how_to: Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, let your arms hang down, curl the dumbbells up to shoulder level, and lower them back down.

name: Spider Curl
how_to: Lie chest down on an incline bench, hold a barbell or dumbbells with an underhand grip, curl the weight up to shoulder level, and lower it back down.
